snippet: Lumière autochromes and other early color photographs made from photosensitive glass plates are the subjects of new books and an exhibition.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; early color photographs, made on glass plates, are subject of several books and coming exhibition at Milwaukee Art Museum; Hispanic Society of America boasts largest collection of Luisa Roldan 17th-century sculpture outside of her native Spain.
lead_paragraph: Lumière autochromes and other early color photographs made from photosensitive glass plates are the subjects of new books and an exhibition.

headline.seo: Lumière Autochromes and Other Early Color Photos
headline.main: Color These Images Rare and Delicate
headline.print_headline: Color These Images Rare and Delicate
